item.title: Arduino Gmail Checker
item.description: I’ve started picking up a few more bits and pieces and came across some 7-segment displays, after thinking of a few ideas for these I decided on using it to display the number of unread emails I have on my gmail account. Intro The displays I picked up are anode displays, meaning they take a positive voltage and to light one of the segments you have to send a LOW (ground) signal to.
